html: "David Moyes in the big games played first not to get beat, then to see what we could get from the game. Before we were always on the front foot." "That mindset came from being Everton manager." @rioferdy5 giving the inside track on David Moyes' failed Man Utd spell #PLTonightpic.twitter.com/pWX8QD6e1p
text:
"David Moyes in the big games played first not to get beat, then to see what we could get from the game. Before we were always on the front foot."

"That mindset came from being Everton manager."

@rioferdy5 giving the inside track on David Moyes' failed Man Utd spell

#PLTonightpic.twitter.com/pWX8QD6e1p

html: "Moyes' hands were on everything at the club, you can do that at Everton, but at Man Utd, you've got to delegate. Ferguson trusted other people." @rioferdy5 on the cultural differences off the pitch between Sir Alex Ferguson and David Moyes. Unmissable insight #PLTonightpic.twitter.com/3SGArwMSSI
text:
"Moyes' hands were on everything at the club, you can do that at Everton, but at Man Utd, you've got to delegate. Ferguson trusted other people."

@rioferdy5 on the cultural differences off the pitch between Sir Alex Ferguson and David Moyes.

Unmissable insight 
#PLTonightpic.twitter.com/3SGArwMSSI

html: Can Chelsea win the league this season? "They are not as good as Liverpool. They are not as good as Man City. I wouldn't say they are as good as Man Utd, or Spurs...but they do have Hazard!" @rioferdy5 thinks Chelsea should be targeting a top four finish under Sarri #PLTonightpic.twitter.com/9J0ptuQ6Wv
text:
Can Chelsea win the league this season?

"They are not as good as Liverpool. They are not as good as Man City. I wouldn't say they are as good as Man Utd, or Spurs...but they do have Hazard!"

@rioferdy5 thinks Chelsea should be targeting a top four finish under Sarri

#PLTonightpic.twitter.com/9J0ptuQ6Wv
